Object.Description: A tome dedicated to the works of a forgotten god. It is written in a strange script that glows with a pure white light.
A Tome made for only the Egyptian Rulers, all who try to possess the power will banished from nobility
A very strong shield made from the strongest and most desirable of all the Earth.
A shield made of sturdy wood.

Object.Description: With the weak grazed, the incantation fells those who remain.
A Spell made by limon to attack microsoft for bringing viruses to his world
A Corrupt Spell, it is not known the power that this can have.
In the event of its owner dying, a charm's polarity completely shifts; turning what was once a device to catch the love of mortals has since become a powerful bitterness-filled weapon.
After the Heros slained Cerberus, they discovered its heart and refined it into a seal.
A Seal of Archdemon Malphas, the king of Hell.
A really powerful seal.
A seal made from the Marble Colossus' head. The power of a pure and mighty paladin still remains within.

EffectInfo.description: Summon an Eye of Marble for 6 seconds

EffectInfo.name: Eye Effect
EffectInfo.description: Heal 50 HP every 1 Sec over 6 Secs

Object.Description: A Seal that contains the power of the Earth Elemental, when activated, will feel a defense as incredible damage.
Infused with the power of the damned, this cloak was said to be worn by Thanatos himself when he was collecting souls all over the world.
An etheral cloak crafted by an ancient guild of satanic worshippers.
Perfect stealth requires one to be perfect themselves. Every movement, every breath, heavily calculated.
This cloak was used by the Tiki Tiki for to hunt and defend himself.
A magical layer that envelops you and gives you mobility as impressive damage.
The slots in this quiver are designated for storing the large fangs of now deceased large spiders.
A mysterious quiver formed of pure evil and dark matter. Its ethereal existence creates a small implosion of nearby atmosphere when drawn.
This Quiver was given to the soul of Stheno to kill everyone who tries to kill her.
This was the legendary Helmet used in the Colosseums. Whoever wore it could not lose
Helm completely covered in gold, its resistance is incredible thanks to the material with which it is made.
It is said that one warrior stole Oryx's helmet, and when it's put into ability mode, the internal rage pulls the warrior straight into the mad god's strength, making him an undefeated champion.
The bitter poison of evergreen berries that has also absorbed a great deal of of energy from evil spirits.\n\nSprite Credits: Dappertron
A deadly gas that will cause you to laugh till death
A poison that is not known where it comes from, but yes, that is strange, and powerful.
Infused with the soul of the Reaper's Raven, this skull holds pure evil.
A Strange Skull, we don't know where it comes.
The cursed skull of a corrupted mind. Good intentions can go horribly wrong.
Screams fill the silence when this trap is left alone...
Encased in a thin glass veil lies the Shatters' ever-burning flames.
This orb contains a good power, forged with water and stones, will give you speed and regeneration.

Object.id: Orb of the Fire Element Egg

Object.Description: An orb that's said to have slowed down the strongest of the Realm winds.
The crystals derived from the Mysterious Crystal seem to sap creatures of their strength while empowering the user.
This prism is made from Thessal's Heart. When used Thessal's soul will grant you and your allies a tiny bit of health as a gift for keeping his heart safe.
With this Prism you zoom.
By directing some of his life force outwards into a destructive blast, Ruthven was able to use this artifact to incapacitate foes much more magically gifted than himself.
The head of the calamity, its incredible pain and craving for death makes this scepter strong.
Thrown with high velocity and on a string, these immensely dangerous throwing daggers leave few alive in their wake, and those remaining are finished off accordingly.
The Star of the Snake Queen, Stheno Queen.
A Shuriken imbued with acid, created by the same crazy scientist Dr. Terrible. It takes the number of times that the creation of it went wrong.
